  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>5b434a90-0434-4195-a581-6f2f6acc8c44#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Aratás</string>
            <string language="en">harvesting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ernten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moisson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raccolta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συγκομιδή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cosechar</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Aratás bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">illustration of harvesting</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gabona,  növénytermesztés,  A földművelés elterjedése,  ősember,  mai ember,  öntözéses gazdálkodás,  termékeny félhold,  </string>
            <string language="en">corn,  cultivation of plants, expansion of agriculture, prehistoric man, modern man,  irrigaton methode,  fertile crescent ,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung des Erntens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustration de la moisson</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ilustração de colher</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustrazione di raccolta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απεικόνιση της συγκομιδής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ilustración de cosechar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mais, Bearbeitung der Betriebe, Expansion der 
Landwirtschaft, prähistorischer Mann, moderner Mann, irrigaton 
methode, fruchtbarer Halbmond,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">maïs, culture des usines, expansion d'agriculture, 
homme préhistorique, homme moderne, methode d'irrigaton, croissant 
fertile,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">milho, cultivation das plantas, expansão da 
agricultura, homem pré-histórico, homem moderno, methode do 
irrigaton, crescente fértil,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cereale, coltura delle piante, espansione di 
agricoltura, uomo prehistoric, uomo moderno, methode del irrigaton, 
mezzaluna fertile,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καλαμπόκι, καλλιέργεια των εγκαταστάσεων, επέκταση της 
γεωργίας, προϊστορικό άτομο, σύγχρονο άτομο, irrigaton 
methode, εύφορη ημισέληνος,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">maíz, cultivación de plantas, extensión de la 
agricultura, hombre prehistórico, hombre moderno, methode del 
irrigaton, crescent fértil,</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
